TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:
[quote name='Tristonwilson12']this is all Arcturusvfx. I have some that I'm finishing up now, will post them later today  

MARS, Kodiak, and some buildings. sorry if I am upsetting everyone by not making/showing any of my own..... but I am[/QUOTE]  

No upset here, Its quite literally a group effort to get this thing done. Besides I'm just a grunt and its been my experience that most bosses don't do a lick of work, JK ;)

It's not important who made it, it's important that this all finally comes together! ;)  

Arcturusvfx, how long are you already modelling btw? And what program do you use?
That model looks amazing.

I am sad to see Kerbin Side and Kerbal Konstructs being no more. Looks like they had to stop updating it because of certain issues with 1.0.5. Unless 1.1 magically fixes these issues, we won't be getting any more updates from those two addons, which in turn means this project is pretty much dead in the water as well. So sad..

[quote name='fairy']I am sad to see Kerbin Side and Kerbal Konstructs being no more. Looks like they had to stop updating it because of certain issues with 1.0.5. Unless 1.1 magically fixes these issues, we won't be getting any more updates from those two addons, which in turn means this project is pretty much dead in the water as well. So sad..[/QUOTE]  

I wouldn't say dead in the water, Maybe slowed down significantly. but not dead.  

........AFAIK.

[quote name='Arcturusvfx']I wouldn't say dead in the water, Maybe slowed down significantly. but not dead.  

........AFAIK.[/QUOTE]  

Unity 5 does not support concave colliders, so nothing will change with 1.1 that will fix the issue as it stands now. But I saw in the KerbinSide thread that someone had posted a pull request for a fix that might work. So we'll just have to wait and see. Hopefully they find a solution.

[quote name='fairy']Unity 5 does not support concave colliders...[/QUOTE]  

Then don't use concave colliders... :sticktongue:  

It's only really a problem for models that are already setup as .mu's (and modders who are too lazy to go in and change their colliders). There's nothing stopping someone from using multiple convex colliders to build up a concave shape.

[quote name='Chris P. Bacon']Then don't use concave colliders... :sticktongue:  

It's only really a problem for models that are already setup as .mu's (and modders who are too lazy to go in and change their colliders). There's nothing stopping someone from using multiple convex colliders to build up a concave shape.[/QUOTE]  

Adapt to survive as they say.
I'm no expert, that is just what AlphaAsh said. But apparently they have found workarounds, so probably nothing to worry about after all.

Some progress on the CST 100 tower.  

[imgur]O0Zzk[/imgur]

[quote name='Arcturusvfx']Some progress on the CST 100 tower.  

[URL]http://imgur.com/a/O0Zzk[/URL][/QUOTE]  

Nice.

Due to the forum migration coming up. I will not be posting updates until 11/28/15, just to make it easier to back up every thing

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-29T15:34:30Z" title="11/29/2015 03:34  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 29, 2015</time> by Tristonwilson12**
Hello big update every one. My laptop broke..... will not continue work until I get a new one. Sorry guys
Ouch!  Not good!

Hello big update every one. My laptop broke..... will not continue work until I get a new one. Sorry guys

But I have been able to do work before it broke![3b5f3f3d79.png](http://puu.sh/lKmEf/3b5f3f3d79.png)

A working transport system for the atlas v![3d317d63c6.png](http://puu.sh/lJLGQ/3d317d63c6.png)
Nice!  Atlas?

I've had a bit of free time lately, and if you'd like, I could probably throw together a quick release in a couple days with the models we've currently got.   If not, I may release my Atlas towers and VAB separately, just to hold folks over.  It's been four months afterall ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
I can release the stuff you have. But I'm not ready to release the atlas. I don't want to release anything that's not done. But I can release the stuff you first sent.

Oh, these past two weeks, I have had nothing but time!  I just haven't had a computer to keep learning Blender.  Got grounded again!  Might be able to get it back if I pass my midterm this Thursday, though!

I have also been holding a secret from my personal life. I'm very sad to say. That I have cancer in my stomach that has held me back for a while. I didn't want to say anything but I guess it's time for me to say it. I start chemo next week. It will be a very tough time. All support is needed. I'm sorry and happy to get this off my chest.
Oh gosh!  You will be in my prayers!  Focus on getting well!

> 
> 
> 7 minutes ago, Sampa said:
> 
> 
> Oh gosh!  You will be in my prayers!  Focus on getting well!
> 

Thank you

Locked at OP request. All the best to you Tristonwilson12, stay strong. 

Edit:

I am very pleased to reopen this thread at OP request. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Thanks red... if you couldnt tell.. i am back and cancer free!!!!!, its been one heck of a ride but i stuck with it. and pulled through with your guys help.. i am very happy to release beta 1 of the real KSC in ksp. and i am dubbing it the "He's Back?!" version. i can thank everyone enough... go get thee new Kerbal Konstructs for 1.1... and the launch sites!!! [on spacedock](http://spacedock.info/mod/459/Real%20Launch%20Sites/Real%20KSC%20in%20KSP)

ZJKABKJBSJKFSJKFKJSFKJBSF

BTW DOES THIS NEED KERBAL KONSTRUCTS AND IS KERBAL KONSTRUCTS COMPATIBLE WITH 1.1?
